main event: On January 2, 1968, an observer sighted an egg-shaped, greenish transparent object near Castle Rock, Colorado, which traveled northward and gained altitude before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as being about 50 ft long and 20 ft high., The sighting took place at approximately 6 p.m., The object lit up the area surrounding the witness., The object was reported to be semi-transparent and luminous, with a peculiar reddish or amber color., Many residents of Castle Rock reported seeing the object, but it could be invisible to some observers due to variations in light sensitivity.
